channel.title: Cant add my server to Server Status page
channel.description: hi, um title says all, when i try to add it, it says that its not online, but i restart the server and everything, nothing works! HELP PLEASE!

item.title: Cant add my server to Server Status page
item.dc:creator: @xXx_gl0wi_xXx xXx gl0wi xXx
item.description:
@xXx_gl0wi_xXx wrote:

[quote=“magep00ner12, post:7, topic:219899”][quote author=hulu link=topic=288810.msg2332941#msg2332941 date=1215973505]

Well, have you portforwarded?
[/quote][quote author=magep00ner12 link=topic=288810.msg2332940#msg2332940 date=1215973432]
Well, have you portforwarded?
[/quote] um, i have not ever added a server to the server status page, so i guess not?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2008, 07:33:03 AM[/size][hr][quote author=hulu link=topic=288810.msg2332938#msg2332938 date=1215973382]
hi, um title says all, when i try to add it, it says that its not online, but i restart the server and everything, nothing works! HELP PLEASE!
[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2008, 07:33:55 AM[/size][hr]bump help plz

You need to port forward and open firewall ports etc. or else no one can join[/quote]

Dont repost my post rofl . i told him that already

Read full topic

item.title: Cant add my server to Server Status page
item.dc:creator: @magep00ner12 magep00ner12
item.description:
@magep00ner12 wrote:

[quote=“hulu, post:3, topic:219899”][quote author=magep00ner12 link=topic=288810.msg2332940#msg2332940 date=1215973432]
Well, have you portforwarded?
[/quote][quote author=magep00ner12 link=topic=288810.msg2332940#msg2332940 date=1215973432]

[/quote] um, i have not ever added a server to the server status page, so i guess not?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2008, 07:33:03 AM[/size][hr][quote author=hulu link=topic=288810.msg2332938#msg2332938 date=1215973382]
hi, um title says all, when i try to add it, it says that its not online, but i restart the server and everything, nothing works! HELP PLEASE!
[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2008, 07:33:55 AM[/size][hr]bump help plz[/quote]

You need to port forward and open firewall ports etc. or else no one can join

item.title: Cant add my server to Server Status page
item.dc:creator: @xXx_gl0wi_xXx xXx gl0wi xXx
item.description:
@xXx_gl0wi_xXx wrote:

You’ll have to portforward
If you’re not portforwarding people cant connect your server .
that means they dont see your server and serverstatus gotta see your server online before you can add it
www.portforward.com

Read full topic
